entry.title: Nokia's Linux based Phone, N900
entry.content:
Nokia has recently released Linux based phone, N900.

It uses Maemo as Linux distribution which is a very old distribution . This is very very older to android. Checkout Maemo.
It may not even get launched in India. Nokia has stated "selected markets" in their press release. No tablet has been officially released by them in the past also here, which is bad news for Indian linux fans
